Name: autosomal recessive congenital ichthyosis
Definition: An ichthyosis that is characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance and abnormal skin scaling over the whole body due to a defect in keratinization.

Name: bullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma
Definition: An ichthyosis characterized by congenital erythema and widespread skin blistering

Name: X-linked ichthyosis
Definition: An ichthyosis that is characterized by a build-up of scales on the skin

Name: ichthyosis vulgaris
